name: Ancient Forest Guardian
description: A massive, ancient tree-like creature that guards the deepest secrets of the forest. Its bark-covered limbs move with surprising agility, and glowing green eyes peer out from the twisted trunk.

attacks.name: Crushing Branch
attacks.description: The guardian slams down with a massive branch

attacks.name: Nature's Wrath
attacks.description: Roots burst from the ground to entangle and strike

attacks.name: Nature's Wrath
attacks.description: The guardian channels the fury of the forest
